-- | Utility for pinging cardano nodes
--   
--   Utility for pinging cardano nodes.
@package cardano-ping
@version 0.8.0.1

module Cardano.Network.Ping
data PingOpts
PingOpts :: Word32 -> Maybe String -> Bool -> Maybe String -> String -> Word32 -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> PingOpts

-- | Number of messages to send to the server
[pingOptsCount] :: PingOpts -> Word32

-- | The host to connect to
[pingOptsHost] :: PingOpts -> Maybe String

-- | Whether to send a query during the handshake to request the available
--   protocol versions
[pingOptsHandshakeQuery] :: PingOpts -> Bool

-- | The unix socket to connect to
[pingOptsUnixSock] :: PingOpts -> Maybe String

-- | The port to connect to
[pingOptsPort] :: PingOpts -> String

-- | The network magic to use for the connection
[pingOptsMagic] :: PingOpts -> Word32

-- | Print output in JSON
[pingOptsJson] :: PingOpts -> Bool

-- | Less verbose output
[pingOptsQuiet] :: PingOpts -> Bool

-- | Get Tip after handshake
[pingOptsGetTip] :: PingOpts -> Bool
data LogMsg
LogMsg :: ByteString -> LogMsg
LogEnd :: LogMsg
data NodeVersion
NodeToClientVersionV9 :: Word32 -> NodeVersion
NodeToClientVersionV10 :: Word32 -> NodeVersion
NodeToClientVersionV11 :: Word32 -> NodeVersion
NodeToClientVersionV12 :: Word32 -> NodeVersion
NodeToClientVersionV13 :: Word32 -> NodeVersion
NodeToClientVersionV14 :: Word32 -> NodeVersion
NodeToClientVersionV15 :: Word32 -> NodeVersion
NodeToClientVersionV16 :: Word32 -> NodeVersion
NodeToClientVersionV17 :: Word32 -> NodeVersion
NodeToClientVersionV18 :: Word32 -> NodeVersion
NodeToClientVersionV19 :: Word32 -> NodeVersion
NodeToClientVersionV20 :: Word32 -> NodeVersion
NodeToNodeVersionV1 :: Word32 -> NodeVersion
NodeToNodeVersionV2 :: Word32 -> NodeVersion
NodeToNodeVersionV3 :: Word32 -> NodeVersion
NodeToNodeVersionV4 :: Word32 -> InitiatorOnly -> NodeVersion
NodeToNodeVersionV5 :: Word32 -> InitiatorOnly -> NodeVersion
NodeToNodeVersionV6 :: Word32 -> InitiatorOnly -> NodeVersion

NodeToNodeVersionV11 :: Word32 -> InitiatorOnly -> NodeVersion
NodeToNodeVersionV12 :: Word32 -> InitiatorOnly -> NodeVersion
NodeToNodeVersionV13 :: Word32 -> InitiatorOnly -> PeerSharing -> NodeVersion
NodeToNodeVersionV14 :: Word32 -> InitiatorOnly -> PeerSharing -> NodeVersion
data HandshakeFailure
UnknownVersionInRsp :: Word -> HandshakeFailure
UnknownKey :: Word -> HandshakeFailure
UnknownTag :: Word -> HandshakeFailure
VersionMissmath :: [Word] -> HandshakeFailure
DecodeError :: Word -> String -> HandshakeFailure
Refused :: Word -> String -> HandshakeFailure
data StatPoint
StatPoint :: UTCTime -> String -> Word16 -> Double -> Double -> Double -> Double -> Double -> Double -> Double -> StatPoint
[spTimestamp] :: StatPoint -> UTCTime
[spHost] :: StatPoint -> String
[spCookie] :: StatPoint -> Word16
[spSample] :: StatPoint -> Double
[spMedian] :: StatPoint -> Double
[spP90] :: StatPoint -> Double
[spMean] :: StatPoint -> Double
[spMin] :: StatPoint -> Double
[spMax] :: StatPoint -> Double
[spStd] :: StatPoint -> Double
data InitiatorOnly
InitiatorOnly :: InitiatorOnly
InitiatorAndResponder :: InitiatorOnly
mainnetMagic :: Word32
pingClient :: Tracer IO LogMsg -> Tracer IO String -> PingOpts -> [NodeVersion] -> AddrInfo -> IO ()
logger :: StrictTMVar IO LogMsg -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> IO ()
supportedNodeToNodeVersions :: Word32 -> [NodeVersion]
supportedNodeToClientVersions :: Word32 -> [NodeVersion]
handshakeDec :: Decoder s (Either HandshakeFailure [NodeVersion])
handshakeReq :: [NodeVersion] -> Bool -> ByteString
isSameVersionAndMagic :: NodeVersion -> NodeVersion -> Bool

instance GHC.Classes.Eq Cardano.Network.Ping.PingOpts
